item.description:
This is the perfect seminar for those who want to know how to view the obstacles in their way and access deeper love and light. THEN break through them with powerful blessings from Mother Clare.
Friday, November 9, 7pm
Suggested Donation $25, Bring a Friend for Free!

group.name: Meditation & Inner Spirituality Group - New Haven

item.name: Mother Clare Seminar Pt 2: The Spiritual Life AND Grace Blessings
